According to a release from Bernie Sanders 's office, the group will meet with organizations representing senior citizens and workers to discuss the future of Social Security. Representatives from the AFL-CIO, the Service Employees International Union, the American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees, and Democratic pollster Celinda Lake were also expected to attend.
